pkgmetadata.longdescription:
The purpose of this project is to create a multi-platform open source file manager (Windows, Linux, FreeBSD, OS X) mimicking the look-n-feel of Far Manager. Currently WCM Commander runs on Windows, Linux, FreeBSD and on OS X using XQuartz.
Features: * mimic look-n-feel (including editor and shortcuts) of Far Manager * built-in terminal * built-in text editor with syntax highlighting * built-in text viewer * virtual file system (smb, ftp, sftp) * very fast user interface
